description: This table stores the DCS IDs of generated PDFs.

columns.name: COMMUNICATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the routing record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LCA_PDF_DOC_INFO_ID
columns.description: This item stores the Document (DCS) IDs of the PDFs generated from an LCA-based patient level communication.
